channel.title: So I'm burning alive here
channel.description:
So I bought this 9800 maybe 3 months back. It was fine until recently. Its been getting hot now and it's taking its toll on my cpu/core. The gpu is idling 57 and the core is idling 63 at 50% So I'm at 60% fan speed right now and the core's 55 and gpu 50.
Anybody want to tell me how I can cool them? [Other then the fans] I have no idea on how to install a heatsink and it seems very hard. Are there any other options?

item.title: So I'm burning alive here
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

make sure ur censors are not faulty, on a few PCs i had, the CPU Core temp was +15c higher than the actual CPU temp. Your GPU at 57c idle is fine, only time you should panic is over 85-90c when in heavy games.

Read full topic

item.title: So I'm burning alive here
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

It’s piss easy, just buy a big ass aftermarket cooler and stick it on the CPU.

Read full topic

item.title: So I'm burning alive here
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:2, topic:317383”]so you are saying both are getting hotter over time?

get a better heatsink for the cpu, RMA the gpu[/quote]
Yes. And I don’t know if I’ll be able to install the damn thing. Whats RMA?
I might just have to pay bestbuy fags to do it…

Read full topic
